author: Tizianop6
body:
#### PR description:

- Added a flag in VertexTimeAlgorithmFromTracksPID.cc vertex time reconstruction algorithm in order to set whether to use the MVA track-MTD score to select tracks or not to be used in time computation. 
- The addition of the flag does not modify the output, since it is set to true by default (as the selection was already in place before this PR).
- Added some plots in MTD Primary4DVertexValidation.cc to study PID performance and track time residuals/pulls, dividing correct/wrong/no PID tracks. 


#### PR validation:

Re-ran reconstruction and validation on a sample. 

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
title: Vertex time reconstruction: added a flag whether to use MVA selection. MTD Primary Vertex Validation: added plots to check PID perfomance and track time assingment.
